CustomField.formula: IF(LEN(BillingStreet) > 0, BillingStreet, "") & IF(LEN(BillingCity) > 0, ", " & BillingCity, "") & IF(LEN(BillingState) > 0, ", " & BillingState, "") & IF(LEN(BillingPostalCode) > 0, ", " & BillingPostalCode, "") & IF(LEN(BillingCountry) > 0, ", " & BillingCountry, "")
CustomField.label: Billing Address Concatenated
